sense.def:
To reach a place
pomeni priti do določenega kraja.

seg.quote: It was dark by the time I reached their house.
It took three days for the letter to reach me.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with or without
OBJ,
with
ADJUNCT

sense.def:
To reach in a particular direction
pomeni iztegniti roko, da bi nekaj naredili ali prijeli.

seg.quote: He reached into his inside pocket and produced a pen.
I reached out my hand to touch him.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
can reach something
, se nečesa lahko dotakne, če iztegne roko.

seg.quote: I can't reach that shelf unless I stand on a chair.

sense.def:
To reach someone
pomeni priti v stik z nekom po telefonu.

Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
reaches a place, level, or stage
, pride do tistega kraja oziroma doseže določen položaj ali stanje.

seg.quote: When the water reached his waist, he had to start swimming.
Rumours of an enemy invasion began to reach the capital.
Unemployment has reached a very high level.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje
reach an agreement, decision, or result
, jim uspe dogovoriti se o sporazumu ali odločitvi oziroma uresničiti določen rezultat.

seg.quote: They managed to reach an agreement on rates of pay.

sense.def:
The upper or lower reaches of a place
so zgornji ali spodnji deli nekega območja.
